# Case css-modules: Step 1

## Changed Files
- style.module.css
- style2.module.css

## Asset Files
- Bundle: bundle.js
- Bundle: style2_module_css.chunk.CURRENT_HASH.js
- Manifest: main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.json, size: 48
- Update: main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js, size: 821
- Update: style2_module_css.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js, size: 692

## Manifest

### main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.json

```json
{"c":["main","style2_module_css"],"r":[],"m":[]}
```


## Update


### main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js

#### Changed Modules
- ./style.module.css

#### Changed Runtime Modules
- webpack/runtime/get_full_hash

#### Changed Content
```js
"use strict";
self["webpackHotUpdate"]("main", {
"./style.module.css": 
/*!**************************!*\
  !*** ./style.module.css ***!
  \**************************/
(function (module, __unused_webpack_exports, __webpack_require__) {
var exports = {
  "class-other": "_style_module_css-class-other",
};
// only invalidate when locals change
var stringified_exports = JSON.stringify(exports);
if (module.hot.data && module.hot.data.exports && module.hot.data.exports != stringified_exports) {
  module.hot.invalidate();
} else {
  module.hot.accept(); 
}
module.hot.dispose(function(data) { data.exports = stringified_exports; });
__webpack_require__.r(module.exports = exports);


}),

},function(__webpack_require__) {
// webpack/runtime/get_full_hash
(() => {
__webpack_require__.h = () => ("CURRENT_HASH")
})();

}
);
```



### style2_module_css.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js

#### Changed Modules
- ./style2.module.css

#### Changed Runtime Modules


#### Changed Content
```js
"use strict";
self["webpackHotUpdate"]("style2_module_css", {
"./style2.module.css": 
/*!***************************!*\
  !*** ./style2.module.css ***!
  \***************************/
(function (module, __unused_webpack_exports, __webpack_require__) {
var exports = {
  "bar": "_style2_module_css-bar",
};
// only invalidate when locals change
var stringified_exports = JSON.stringify(exports);
if (module.hot.data && module.hot.data.exports && module.hot.data.exports != stringified_exports) {
  module.hot.invalidate();
} else {
  module.hot.accept(); 
}
module.hot.dispose(function(data) { data.exports = stringified_exports; });
__webpack_require__.r(module.exports = exports);


}),

});
```
